    font-family: 'Roboto';
}

.TourDates p {
    font-size: 16px;
}

ul.highlight-this-tour li:before {
    content: "\f191";
    font: normal 14px/1 FontAwesome;
    color: #444;
    display: inline-block !important;
    width: 1em;
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0 5px 0 0;
    text-align: center;
    font-variant: normal;
    text-transform: none;
    line-height: 1em;
    position: relative;
}
h2.tourDBox {
    font-weight: bold;
}
.TourList {
    border-left: dashed 1px #d8d8d8;
    border-radius: 0px;
    float: left;
    width: 100%;
    position: relative;
}
.TourDates:first-child {
    margin-top: 0;
    padding-top: 0;
}
.TourDates {
    margin: 15px 0 15px 0px;
    padding-top: 10px;
    margin-left: 20px;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #d8d8d8;
    font-size: 16px;
    cursor: pointer;
    display: block;
    color: #1F2225;
    float: left;
    width: 98%;
}
.TourDay_details {
    float: left;
    width: 85%;
    letter-spacing: 0.5px;
    word-spacing: 0.8px;
    line-height: normal;
    font-size: 14px;
}
.TourDay {
    color: #c00100;
    margin-right: 10px;
    float: left;
}
.expBut {
    width: 26px;
    text-align: center;
    color: #061b30;
    height: 28px;
    line-height: 23px;
    float: right;
    margin-left: 5px;
    margin-bottom: 6px;
    cursor: pointer;
    text-align: center;
    font-weight: bold;
    float: right;
    font-size: 22px;
    padding: 0 4px;
    border-radius: 21px;
}
.TourList .TourInfo {
    margin-left: 0;
    padding: 0 0px 20px 20px;
    background-color: white;
    overflow: hidden;
}
.tour-overview p, .tour-collection p {
    text-align: justify;
}
.TourList::after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    width: 18px;
    height: 18px;
    left: -11px;
    background-color: white;
    border: 2px solid #061b30;
    top: 0px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    z-index: 1;
}
.tour-collection {
    float: left;
    width: 100%;
}

.sidebar_section_col, .sidebar_section_col2 {
    margin: 0 0 15px 0;
    background: #fff;

    box-shadow: 0 1px 5px 0 rgb(0 0 0 / 30%);

}

    padding: 10px;

}

}

}

.sidebar_section_col ul li:before {
    display: none;
}
.sidebar_section_col ul li {

    border-bottom: 1px dotted #d8d7d4;
}

}

}

}

}

<div id="tourflexBox1" class="cmsmasters_row_outer_parent">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_outer">

<div class="cmsmasters_column one_first">
<div class="custom_html">
<div class="tourbrd">
<h1>South India Temple Tour Packages from Delhi</h1>
<p><span><a href="/" title="Home">Home</a> » <a href="/india-tour-packages" title="India Tour Packages">India</a> » <a href="/south-india-tour" title="South India Tour Packages">South India</a> » <span class="breadcrumb_last" aria-current="page">South India Temple Tour Packages from Delhi</span></span></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div id="cmsmasters_row_673c3227c87ca8_63100813" class="cmsmasters_row cmsmasters_color_scheme_default tourflexBox cmsmasters_row_top_default cmsmasters_row_bot_default cmsmasters_row_boxed">
<div id="tourflexBox2" class="cmsmasters_row_outer_parent">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_outer">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_inner">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_margin">
<div class="cmsmasters_column two_third">
<div class="custom_html tourIB1">
<div class="proGall"><img decoding="async" src="/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/south-india-temple-tour-packages-from-delhi.jpg" alt="South India Temple Tour Packages from Delhi" title="South India Temple Tour Packages from Delhi" width="750" height="450" loading="lazy"></div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB2">
<div class="tour-overview">
<div class="toBt"><i class="fa fa-file"></i> Tour Overview</div>
<p>India is a country of diverse religions and faiths. There are historical and religious tales to be found all around our nation, every temple has a specific history and significance. The pilgrimage sites around the country are always seen crowded with thousands of devotees and South Indian temples are one of the most revered pilgrimage sites in India. Therefore, we have created a 12 day tour package from Delhi to South India temples which includes accommodation with basic necessary amenities, meals, transfers and a dedicated tour guide.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB3">
<div class="tour-collection">
<h2 class="tourDBox"><i class="fa fa-bus" aria-hidden="true"></i> Tour Itinerary</h2>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details" id="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 1 :</span>Delhi to Chennai</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo">
<p>Start your spiritual journey from Delhi airport. Board the flight to Chennai. It usually takes 3 hours to reach Chennai from Delhi by air. Once you arrive in Chennai, one of our representatives will pick you from the airport and get you checked-in to the hotel we have booked for you. You will be staying at the hotel in Chennai overnight.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 2 :</span>Chennai - Tirupati - Chennai</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo">
<p>After having breakfast at the hotel, you will head for Tirupati temple Darshan located in Andhra Pradesh. It will take 3 to 4 hours to reach Tirupati. Once there, you will visit some of the famous temples in Tirupati like Sri Padmavathi Temple, Sri Kalahasteeswara Temple, Sri Kodandaramaswami Temple, Kalyana Venkateswara Swamy Temple, Govindaraja Swamy Temple and Kapila Theertham. After Darshan at all the temples you will travel back to your hotel in Chennai and stay for the night.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 3 :</span>Chennai - Kanchipuram - Mamallapuram</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo">
<p>Today you will leave for Mamallapuram and will stop at Kanchipuram enroute. After sightseeing at the temples in Kanchipuram, you will head towards Mamallapuram also known as Mahabalipuram. You will check-in to the hotel once reached. Take some rest and go out exploring Mamallapuram. You will visit Shore Temple and Krishna Mandapam. Later you will travel back to your hotel and stay there for the night.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 4 :</span>Mamallapuram - Tiruvannamalai - Pondicherry</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo">
<p>Post breakfast, you will travel to Tiruvannamalai. Visit Arunachala temple dedicated to Lord Shiva and offer prayers. After exploring, you will travel towards Puducherry. Check-in to the hotel where you will stay overnight.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 5 :</span>Exploring Puducherry</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo">
<p>Today will be spent exploring the French Colonial settlement, Puducherry which is a Union Territory of India. Visit Sri Aurobindo ashram, Church of the Sacred Heart Jesus, the Sacre Coeur Church and Pondicherry Museum. You will also visit Manakula Vinayagar Koil Temple which is dedicated to Lord Ganesha. Afterwards, head back to your hotel for dinner and a relaxing night.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 6 :</span>Puducherry - Chidambaram - Thanjavur</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo">
<p>Today’s destination will be Thanjavur, earlier known as Tanjore. The journey is about 5 hours long. You will be stopping over at Chidambaram for a quick excursion. Visit the Nataraja temple which is solely dedicated to the cosmic dancing form of Lord Shiva i.e Nataraja and signifies the art of Bharatanatyam. After that continue the journey further to Thanjavur. Once arrived, check-in and stay for the night.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 7 :</span>Thanjavur - Tiruchirappalli (Trichy)</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo">
<p>Visit Brihadeeswara temple in Thanjavur which is a UNESCO world heritage site and is said to be one of the oldest temples dedicated to Lord Shiva. After Darshan you will head to Trichy and check in to the hotel there. You can enjoy the evening strolling around at nearby places or markets. Stay overnight at the hotel.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 8 :</span>Trichy to Madurai</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo">
<p>You will start your journey after breakfast at the hotel. The first stop will be Srirangam located on an island. Visit Sri Ranganathaswamy temple surrounded by the river Kaveri. Next you'll visit the famous landmark of Trichy which is the Rock Fort. Lastly, you will travel to Madurai. Check-in to the hotel and stay for the night.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 9 :</span>Exploring Madurai</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo">
<p>Post breakfast, explore the sacred town of Madurai located on the bank of river Vaigai.<strong>Visit Meenakshi Amman temple</strong>which is dedicated to Goddess Parvati and Lord Shiva. You will attend the evening ceremony at the temple and seek blessings from the divine. After sightseeing and temple visit, you will head back to your hotel in Madurai for an overnight stay.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 10 :</span>Madurai to Kanyakumari</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo">
<p>You will leave for the southernmost tip of India, Kanyakumari, today. The journey is about 4 to 5 hours long. Once you reach, visit Swami Vivekananda’s memorial, Kumari Amman Temple and Thiruvalluvar Statue. Once you finish exploring and visiting all the key attractions, you will be staying at the hotel in Kanyakumari itself for the night.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 11 :</span>Kanyakumari - Trivandrum</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo">
<p>In the morning after having your breakfast you will travel to Trivandrum which is a 3 - 4 hours long ride. Once there, check in at the hotel and take some rest. After relaxing a little, you will visit Padmanabha Swamy temple dedicated to Lord Vishnu and also visit Napier Museum. After sightseeing, you will head back to your hotel and stay overnight.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 12 :</span>Departure from Trivandrum</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo">
<p>This will be the final day of your South Indian pilgrimage tour. You will check-out and will be dropped at the airport. You can then fly back to Delhi or your native place with beautiful memories.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB5">

<div class="custom_html tourIB3">
<div class="tour-collection">
<h3><i class="cmsmasters-icon-flight" aria-hidden="true"></i> Trip Highlights</h3>
<ul class="highlight-this-tour">
<li>Tirumala Venkateswara temple Darshan in Tirupati.</li>
<li>Explore Kanchipuram “the city of thousand temples”.</li>
<li>Visit Shore temple and Five Rathas in Mamallapuram.</li>
<li>Arunachalam temple Darshan in Tiruvannamalai.</li>
<li>Visit Sri Aurobindo Ashram and Pondicherry Museum in Puducherry.</li>
<li>Nataraja temple Darshan at Chidambaram.</li>
<li>Explore the UNESCO world heritage site Brihadeeswarar temple in Thanjavur.</li>
<li>Visit Sri Ranganathaswamy temple in Srirangam.</li>
<li>Visit Meenakshi temple in Madurai.</li>
<li>Explore Kumari Amman Temple and Vivekananda Rock Memorial in Kanyakumari.</li>
<li>Visit Padmanabhaswamy temple in Trivandrum.</li>
</ul>
<p>If you are planning to go on Hindu Pilgrimage Tour in South India then this package is for you. Experience the sacred ambience and beautiful lush green scenery of South Indian states and explore the marvelous ancient temples with us.</p>
</div>
</div>

		<p><span class="wpcf7-form-control-wrap" data-name="your-date"><input size="40" maxlength="400" class="wpcf7-form-control wpcf7-text wpcf7-validates-as-required" aria-required="true" aria-invalid="false" placeholder="Time of Travel*" value="" type="text" name="your-date" /></span><span class="wpcf7-form-control-wrap" data-name="your-trMess"><textarea cols="40" rows="10" maxlength="140" class="wpcf7-form-control wpcf7-textarea" aria-invalid="false" placeholder="Write a description of your tour so we can design the best package for you!" name="your-trMess"></textarea></span>
		</p>
		<div>
			<p><button type="submit" class="waves-bxt submitBtn2">SEND ME DETAILS <i class="fa fa-arrow-circle-right"></i></button><br />
<span class="infoBxs">We never share your Information.</span>
			</p>
		</div>
	</div>
</div><div class="wpcf7-response-output" aria-hidden="true"></div>
</form>
</div>
</div>
